content:
Please note that the prices mentioned are approximate and may not be entirely accurate due to the lack of formal data on the informal economy of Kowloon Walled City. Moreover, the prices are adjusted for inflation based on 2023 figures.

1. Food and drink:
a. Street food (e.g., noodles, dumplings, or rice dishes) - HKD 30-50 (USD 3.85-6.42)
b. Tea or soft drink at a local café - HKD 10-20 (USD 1.28-2.56)
2. Entertainment:
a. Entrance to a gambling den - HKD 100-300 (USD 12.82-38.46)
b. Visiting an arcade or games center - HKD 20-50 (USD 2.56-6.42)
3. Accommodation:
a. Renting a small room for a night - HKD 150-300 (USD 19.23-38.46)
4. Services:
a. Basic haircut at a local barber - HKD 30-50 (USD 3.85-6.42)
b. Dental check-up at an unlicensed clinic - HKD 100-200 (USD 12.82-25.64)
c. Basic medical consultation at an unlicensed clinic - HKD 150-300 (USD 19.23-38.46)
5. Shopping:
a. Handmade trinkets or souvenirs - HKD 20-100 (USD 2.56-12.82)
b. Clothing or textiles from local workshops - HKD 50-200 (USD 6.42-25.64)

Please note that many of these goods and services would have been offered informally and may not have adhered to regulatory standards. The prices may also have been negotiable, depending on the specific circumstances and individual vendors.
